text: Weâ€™ll someone's block the /cs/c subdirectory which helps a bit. We don't block the parameters although it's tempting. Gotta be careful with what you block in robots as it stops crawling but not indexation, and blocking often backfires. I wish we had a way to add an optional rel attributes to CTAs so that links could be appended with a rel=nofollow. That would largely solve it.
